Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.states

Class ActivateProdState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.states.TurnState
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.states.ActivateProdState
public class ActivateProdState
extends TurnState
Finalize the production when all the resources has been payed.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ActivateProdState​(Controller controller)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void activateProduction()
    Activate the last phase of a generic production putting produced resources in the strongbox and adding faith points (whether is specified by the production) to the current turn's player
    void completeTurn()
    It adds all the resources produced in this turn to the strongbox and makes the current player's dashboard forget all the productions used in the current turn.

  • Method Details

    • activateProduction

      public void activateProduction()
      Activate the last phase of a generic production putting produced resources in the strongbox and adding faith points (whether is specified by the production) to the current turn's player
      Overrides:

    • completeTurn

      public void completeTurn()
      It adds all the resources produced in this turn to the strongbox and makes the current player's dashboard forget all the productions used in the current turn. Then notify the controller to trigger the next turn.
      Specified by:
      completeTurn in class TurnState
